definition: pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The proud day hope to meet with the boss behind the mr. han, mr. han promised.
sentences.chinese: 傲天希望拜會韓立背後的老闆，韓立一口答應。

sentences.english: The following table lists the object-specific access rights.
sentences.chinese: 下表列出了特定對象的拜會權限。

sentences.english: Small years, the company held a review and give recognition and the gathering will be.
sentences.chinese: 小年裏，公司召開了總結表彰和團拜會。

sentences.english: On the following morning he hastened to Rosings to pay his respects.
sentences.chinese: 第二天上午，他趕快到羅新斯去拜會。

sentences.english: Of course, employing this formula required meeting many more philosophers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，採用這種原則需要拜會多得多的哲學家。

sentences.english: Following the meeting, Li Zhaoxing paid a visit to Zahir Shah, Former King of Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，李肇星拜會了阿富汗前國王查希爾。

sentences.english: In Saint Paul, the largest city in Brazil, the delegation paid a courtesy call on the city council and government.
sentences.chinese: 在巴西聖保羅市，代表團分別拜會了市議會和政府。

sentences.english: The Roosevelts visited Italy and met the king and queen.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福夫婦訪問意大利，拜會了意大利的國王和王后。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation
to receive sb/to grant an interview
Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council (abbr. for 國務院港澳事務辦公室|国务院港澳事务办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Gang3 Ao4 Shi4 wu4 Ban4 gong1 shi4])
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
